books.title: The Bhagavad Gita
books.author: Vyasa
books.description: A 700-verse Hindu scripture that is part of the epic Mahabharata, dated to the second half of the first millennium BCE and is typical of the Hindu synthesis.

books.title: Deep Learning
books.author: Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville
books.description: An introduction to a broad range of topics in deep learning, covering mathematical and conceptual background, deep learning techniques used in industry.

books.title: The Hard Thing About Hard Things
books.author: Ben Horowitz
books.description: Building a business when there are no easy answers. Ben Horowitz offers essential advice on building and running a startupâ€”practical wisdom for managing the toughest problems business school doesn't cover.
keyTakeaways: Focus on what you need to do, not what you want to do

books.title: Zero to One
books.author: Peter Thiel
books.description: Notes on startups, or how to build the future. Peter Thiel reveals how we can find singular ways to create those new things that will make the future not just different, but better.
keyTakeaways: Create new value, don't compete in existing markets
Technology is about creating the future

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: The story of Facebook's founding and the lawsuits that followed, exploring ambition, betrayal, and innovation.

movies.title: 3 Idiots
movies.description: Two friends embark on a quest for a lost buddy. On this journey, they encounter a long-forgotten bet, a wedding they must crash, and a funeral that goes impossibly out of control.

movies.title: Her
movies.description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.
